summary: August 30 is the 242nd day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: The Tandy Center Subway operated in Fort Worth, Texas, from February 15, 1963 to August 30, 2002. It ran a distance of 0.7 miles  and was, during the period of its operation, the only privately owned subway in the United States.
title: Tandy Center Subway
